poem.title: Mutes
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
Get aff yr elkie and produce
A chocolate mouse or chocolate mousse
If this loudmouth's to be reduced
To slurping silence
You'll make four yolks the butt of your
Vicarious violence.

Beat them into bitter, uncomplaining
Melted chocolate, whisk
The whites and fold them it.
Thank you.
